mapper.select: select postNo, cateNo, postTitle, postContent, to_char(regDate, 'YYYY/MM/dd') regDate from post where cateNo=#{max} and postNo=(select max(postNo) from post)
select postNo, cateNo, postTitle, postContent, to_char(regDate, 'YYYY/MM/dd') regDate from post where cateNo = #{max} order by postNo desc
select postNo, cateNo, postTitle, postContent, to_char(regDate, 'YYYY/MM/dd') regDate from post where cateNo = #{cateNo} and postNo = #{postNo}
select max(postNo) from post where cateNo = #{cateNo}
